name: Detection of SafetyKatz
pattern:
title: Detection of SafetyKatz
id: e074832a-eada-4fd7-94a1-10642b130e16
status: experimental
description: Detects possible SafetyKatz Behaviour
references:
    - https://github.com/GhostPack/SafetyKatz
tags:
    - attack.credential_access
    - attack.t1003
author: Markus Neis
date: 2018/07/24
logsource:
    product: windows
    service: sysmon
detection:
    selection:
        EventID: 11
        TargetFilename: '*\Temp\debug.bin'
    condition: selection
falsepositives:
    - Unknown
level: high
